context_bundle.summary: AWS CDK is an open-source software development framework for defining cloud infrastructure in code and provisioning it through AWS CloudFormation

onboarding.quick_start: cdk init app --language typescript && npm install @aws-cdk/aws-s3 && cdk deploy
common_patterns: App initialization: 'cdk init app --language <language>' to scaffold new CDK project
Stack definition: 'export class MyStack extends cdk.Stack { constructor(scope, id, props) { super(scope, id, props)'
Construct usage: 'new s3.Bucket(this, 'MyBucket', { versioned: true, encryption: s3.BucketEncryption.S3_MANAGED })'
Dependencies: 'npm install @aws-cdk/aws-<service>' or 'pip install aws-cdk.<service>' for service constructs
Synthesis: 'cdk synth' to generate CloudFormation template from CDK code
Diff deployment: 'cdk diff' to preview changes before deployment
known_errors: Bootstrap required: 'cdk bootstrap aws://ACCOUNT/REGION' for initial CDK deployment setup
Synthesis failed: 'npm run build' to compile TypeScript before cdk synth
Permission denied: 'aws sts get-caller-identity' and verify IAM credentials and permissions
Stack creation failed: 'aws cloudformation describe-stack-events --stack-name MyStack' for error details
Asset upload error: 'cdk deploy --asset-ecr-repository-name <repo>' to fix container asset storage
